00037 namespace Ogre {
00038 
00054     class _OgreExport Pose : public AnimationAlloc
00055     {
00056     public:
00062         Pose(ushort target, const String& name = StringUtil::BLANK);
00063         virtual ~Pose();
00065         const String& getName(void) const { return mName; }
00067         ushort getTarget(void) const { return mTarget; }
00069         typedef map<size_t, Vector3>::type VertexOffsetMap;
00071         typedef MapIterator<VertexOffsetMap> VertexOffsetIterator;
00073         typedef ConstMapIterator<VertexOffsetMap> ConstVertexOffsetIterator;
00074 
00079         void addVertex(size_t index, const Vector3& offset);
00080 
00082         void removeVertex(size_t index);
00083 
00085         void clearVertexOffsets(void);
00086 
00088         ConstVertexOffsetIterator getVertexOffsetIterator(void) const;
00090         VertexOffsetIterator getVertexOffsetIterator(void);
00092         const VertexOffsetMap& getVertexOffsets(void) const { return mVertexOffsetMap; }
00093 
00095         const HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr& _getHardwareVertexBuffer(size_t numVertices) const;
00096 
00100         Pose* clone(void) const;
00101     protected:
00103         ushort mTarget;
00105         String mName;
00107         VertexOffsetMap mVertexOffsetMap;
00109         mutable HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr mBuffer;
00110     };
00111     typedef vector<Pose*>::type PoseList;
